summary: Tested internal linking feature for SEO optimization. All backend APIs working correctly (18/18 tests pass). Frontend internal linking sections display properly on both CountryPage and ChannelPage.

api_channels_related.details: Returns related channels from same country, excludes current channel, respects limit parameter, returns 404 for invalid channels

api_countries_neighbors.details: Returns neighboring countries from same region with top channel info, excludes current country, includes region metadata

country_page_neighbors_section.details: Shows 8 neighboring countries from same region (Asia for India), each with flag, name, and top channel info. Links navigate correctly to country pages.

country_page_discover_more.details: Shows site navigation with Popular Countries, Rankings, Tools, and Resources sections. All 12 internal links present and working.

country_page_more_youtubers.details: Section only appears when country has >3 channels. India has 3 channels, so section doesn't show (expected behavior per code).

channel_page_related_channels.details: Shows 2 related channels (SET India, T-Series Telugu) with thumbnails and subscriber counts. 'View all' link navigates to country page.

channel_page_explore_more.details: Context-aware navigation with 'Top channels in India' and 'Compare ChuChu with others' (pre-fills channel ID in compare URL). All links working.

link_navigation_test.details: All internal links are clickable and navigate to correct pages - neighbor country links, related channel links, 'View all' links, compare links with pre-filled IDs

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All internal linking sections working correctly

context_for_next_testing_agent: Internal linking feature complete. APIs: GET /api/channels/{id}/related and GET /api/countries/{code}/neighbors both working. Frontend shows 'Top YouTube Channels in [Region]' on country pages with neighboring countries. Channel pages show 'Other Popular YouTubers from [Country]' with related channels. 'Discover More' and 'Explore More' navigation sections present with context-aware links. Note: 'More YouTubers from [Country]' section only appears when country has >3 channels (currently no country has >3).
mocked_apis_note: Channel data for ~70 countries uses placeholder data due to YouTube API limits (as mentioned in request).
